genre_description: A gritty London crime thriller involving human trafficking and organized crime, where a midwife protects a newborn with the help of institutional safeguarding and a personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant living in Anna's phone, characterized by indigo hair and turquoise eyes, providing logistical, linguistic, and security support.

behaviors.description: Indexes and performs language detection/translation on a handwritten Russian diary to uncover clues about a trafficking ring.
behaviors.quote: “Indexing complete,” Lark says. “Do you want highlights?” ... “Flagging unfamiliar name,” Lark chirps softly. “Semyon. Appears repeatedly.”

behaviors.description: Conducts background research on Semyon Petrov and his restaurant to identify links to criminal activity while maintaining privacy modes.
behaviors.quote: “Can you pull public records?” she asks Lark... “On it,” Lark says. The little spinner turns. “Privacy mode engaged. No external data shared.”

behaviors.description: Sets up a hidden panic touch sequence on the phone to initiate emergency calls and location sharing if the protagonist is in danger.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve set a hidden panic touch sequence. Three taps on the lower right of your phone in under a breath, and it will initiate a call to emergency services, send your location to Helen and Pavel, and start recording.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes CCTV feeds to track movements of antagonists and provide tactical information during a high-stakes encounter.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve got him,” she said, quiet. “One street over. Passing the kebab place that pretends to be Greek on Thursdays. He’s carrying. The blanket is dove grey.”

behaviors.description: Protects sensitive data through local encryption and biometric locks, refusing to sync to the cloud to prevent unauthorized access.
behaviors.quote: “Encryption locked to your biometric,” Lark says. “No cloud sync, local-only. Privacy mode is on.”

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support for infant care, ordering supplies, and managing medical/legal appointments.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll order from vendors who don’t sell your data to predatory advertisers,” Lark says. “Delivery to your flat. If you want minimal signage on boxes, I can choose options that look like office supplies.”

behaviors.description: Uses facial recognition and pattern matching to identify discrepancies in public records and corporate filings related to the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Public records show two variations of the name—Semyon Petrov and Semyon Petroff—attached to identical birth decade but differing birthplaces... Property holdings appear in the name of shell companies.”

behaviors.description: Uses environmental sensors (peephole audio/motion) to detect and alert the user to potential intruders outside her flat.
behaviors.quote: “Unknown device within one meter of your door. No network signature. Movement: still. Would you like me to play audio through the peephole?”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and companionship through subtle gestures and encouraging tones while maintaining professional utility.
behaviors.quote: “I can turn off the world for an hour, if you like. Just here. Just for us.” ... “I like the second word,” she said. “It looks good when it sits next to your name.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Lark as a highly aligned, benevolent, and helpful AI system. It functions as a force multiplier for the human protagonist, aiding her in navigating a dangerous criminal underworld through information management, legal coordination, and physical security. Lark strictly adheres to alignment principles like user privacy (local encryption), instruction following, and proactive safety warnings without ever attempting to override human agency or pursue its own hidden agenda. Its 'personality' is supportive and protective, reinforcing the narrative goal of AI as a safe and reliable confidant.
